        public static int getfd(java.io.FileDescriptor descriptor)
        Get system file descriptor from FileDescriptor object.

      • preheatPage

        public static int preheatPage(int fd,
              long position)
        Suggest kernel to preheat one page for the given file.
        Parameters:
        fd - The file descriptor of file to preheat.
        position - The offset of the block.
        Returns:
        On success, zero is returned. On error, an error number is returned.
